points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur la manière dont vos données personnelles sont utilisées
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data

case.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
case.localized_title: Des informations sont fournies sur la manière dont ils collectent les données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.

points.title: Pseudonyms are allowed

case.title: Pseudonyms are allowed
case.localized_title: Les pseudonymes sont autorisés
case.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.localized_title: Ce service peut collecter, utiliser et partager des données de localisation
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Les informations vous concernant sont recueillies par des tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates

case.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
case.localized_title: Ce service reçoit votre position précise grâce aux coordonnées GPS
case.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.

points.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Vous êtes suivi par les cookies/pixels des médias sociaux.
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles peuvent être utilisées à des fins de marketing
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics

case.title: Your personal data is aggregated into statistics
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont regroupées dans des statistiques
case.description: Your personal data is used for statistics in a de-identified/aggregated form (i.e. not directly linked to a unique identity) to analyse trends, for research and for analytics.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

case.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
case.localized_title: Vos données peuvent être traitées et stockées partout dans le monde
case.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

points.title: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking
points.analysis: There is no way to opt out of tracking without upgrading to a paying subscription.

case.title: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking
case.localized_title: Ce service continue de vous suivre même si vous avez choisi de ne pas le faire
case.description: Users can’t fully opt out of tracking technologies used for non essential purposes such as advertising, marketing or analytics. The user may be asked for consent for installing some tracking technologies on the device, and even if all are rejected the service will still track its visitors and ignore the choice.This case doesn’t apply to functional cookies that are necessary to provide the services.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour la publicité
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you

case.title: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you
case.localized_title: Ce service se réserve le droit de divulguer vos informations personnelles sans vous en informer
case.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.

points.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions

case.title: Extra data may be collected about you through promotions
case.localized_title: Des données supplémentaires peuvent être collectées à votre sujet dans le cadre de promotions
case.description: Additional personal data may be collected through contests, surveys, promotions, petitions or sweepstakes.

points.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont utilisées pour faire de la publicité ciblée par des tiers.
case.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

points.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data

case.title: You can retrieve an archive of your data
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez récupérer une archive de vos données
case.description: Users can request a copy of the data collected through the services and infer from it the amount of personal information that is processed and stored by the Service. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.

case.title: This Service provides a list of Third Parties involved in its operation.
case.localized_title: Ce service fournit une liste des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement.
case.description: The Service provides a list detailing the third parties involved, their roles, and may even provide more information.

points.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim

case.title: Instructions are provided on how to submit a copyright claim
case.localized_title: Des instructions sont fournies sur la manière de soumettre une demande de droits d'auteur.
case.description: If content that you own is copied or made accessible through the service in a way that constitutes an intellectual property right infringement, you can report it following the instructions given in the agreements.

points.title: No guarantee is given regarding quality

case.title: No guarantee is given regarding quality
case.localized_title: Aucune garantie n'est donnée quant à la qualité
case.description: The Service doesn't warrant or guarantee the quality of the products or services provided.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service transmet vos données personnelles à des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
points.analysis: Even though they ensure shared data is in aggregated form, geolocation data is collected directly from partners, and it can easily reveal an identity.

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service partage vos données personnelles avec des tiers qui ne sont pas essentiels à son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials

case.title: You are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses that may incur by downloading materials
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable de tous les risques, dommages ou pertes que vous pourriez encourir en téléchargeant du matériel
case.description: Users are responsible for any harm to their computer system or loss of data they may incur through the download of materials from the service.

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements

case.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
case.localized_title: Ce service ne garantit pas que lui-même ou les produits obtenus par son intermédiaire répondent à vos attentes ou à vos exigences
case.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

points.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

case.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
case.localized_title: Vous acceptez de ne pas soumettre de contenu diffamatoire, harcelant ou menaçant.
case.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.

points.title: You are solely responsible for claims made against the service and agree to indemnify and hold harmless the service.

case.title: You agree to indemnify and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
case.localized_title: Vous êtes seul responsable des réclamations faites à l'encontre du service et acceptez d'indemniser et de dégager de toute responsabilité le service.
case.description:
You are responsible for your use of the service. If a claim arises related to that use, you agree to indemnify and hold the service harmless.
If users are also required to defend the service, see Case 146 instead.

points.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
points.analysis: Each portion of data on its own isn't personal data, but gathered it may be enough to uniquely identify someone.

case.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
case.localized_title: Vos données personnelles sont utilisées à des fins publicitaires
case.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location

case.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
case.localized_title: Votre adresse IP est collectée, ce qui peut être utilisé pour connaître votre position approximative.

points.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
points.analysis: If modifications are only displayed at that page, no notification will be given.

case.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you
case.localized_title: Les conditions peuvent être modifiées à tout moment, à leur discrétion, sans préavis.
case.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.

points.title: If you have a paid account, you can opt out of targeted advertising

case.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
case.localized_title: Si vous disposez d'un compte payant, vous pouvez refuser la publicité ciblée.
case.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.

points.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

case.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
case.localized_title: De nombreux tiers sont impliqués dans l'exploitation du service
